meanings.definition: Not conforming to the rules of grammar.
meanings.sent1: Her ungrammatical sentences were hard to understand.
meanings.sent2: The teacher corrected the ungrammatical essay.
meanings.sent3: It was funny how his ungrammatical speech made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The ungrammatical writing danced across the page like a clumsy ballerina.
meanings.sent5: The ungrammatical errors stood out like bright red flags.

meanings.sent1: The ungrammatical text was full of mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the ungrammatical punctuation in the email.
meanings.sent3: The ungrammatical sentences played hide and seek with correct grammar.
meanings.sent4: His ungrammatical writing was a tangled mess of words.
meanings.sent5: The ungrammatical errors whispered secrets of confusion.
